name: GGGGAME
description:
GGGGame : Gamer's Gamer's Gamer's Game for Gamer​



You can control your character who playing some video games, avoiding his cats disturbance. Also your character can control his character who avoids missile. and he can control his character who avoids sniper rifle, and he can control the spaceship to destroy invaders! If you want to be a game master, you must earn 10 point to shooting enemy. Do you think it is possible? Just try it!
